item.title: How I'm moving to AWS S3 Pt.2
item.description:
Intermezzo

Henlo, back again … Been a while I haven’t write the continuation of this story of how I’m moving my data from GCP Cloud Storage to AWS S3. much already happen, this and that don’t really want to go into detail but here I’m back …

but before begin, sorry for not posting but I will try to make post about anything for now atleast once a month, if I dont have then I don’t really have something to post at the moment and probably busy with my new job 😓.

item.title: Why I'm moving to AWS S3 Pt.1
item.description:
Intermezzo

Henlo and Happy New Year 2024, I hope you guys in healthy condition and still have lots to achieve this year 😁

So, actually long story short … I’m actually GCP person since 2018/2019, the first time I ever learn Cloud Tech and also getting my first certificate in cloud, even tho it is still associate level lol. By that time I’m getting used to using GCP as my primary Cloud Stacks
